name: immoralist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
someone who is immoral (= behaves in a way that is morally wrong or outside of society's accepted standards): He is well known as a self-proclaimed immoralist. They think of the group as a bunch of immoralists.
More examplesFewer examplesThe villain is a confident, guiltless immoralist who sweeps through the opera like some uncontrollable force of nature.He puts forward the idea that the greatest artists are immoralists.We were, in the strictest sense, immoralists because we recognized no moral obligation to conform or obey.
